title: Pet-Friendly - SS Appliances - Upscale 1+1 in WeHo - 1 Month Free Rent
posting_body: ['1 Month Free Rent!', 'Welcome home to Selworth Apartments, located in West Hollywood, CA.', 'Our apartment homes are fully renovated and include hardwood style flooring, modern kitchen appliances, and much more.', 'Community amenities include a pool, subterranean parking, laundry on site, and more.', 'LOCATION:', '7941 Selma Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90046', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'Amenities:', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Dishwasher', '- Pool', '- Non Smoking Community', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Vinyl Plank Flooring', '- Laundry On Site', '- Disposal', '- Subterranean Parking', '- Air Conditioning', '- Carpeting', '- Gas Range', '- Refrigerator', '- Courtyard', 'Pet-Friendly:', 'Cats and Dogs Welcome.', 'Additional Fees and Deposit May Apply.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', 'Square Feet is approximate.', 'Price & availability are conditional.', 'Interior photos may not be of exact unit.']
